title: Enrich FTTH orders with data available by the Glasfaserportal
description:
Description
In the ever-evolving landscape of fiber-optic connectivity, the demand for high-speed internet through Fiber to the Home (FTTH) solutions continues to surge. To meet this demand and elevate the customer experience, we embark on a transformative journey to enhance our FTTH order processing by leveraging the rich data resources of the Glasfaserportal.
We aim to make the following data available through POT:
Termine im Voraus
Abbruchgründe
Ausbaustatus
Zieltermin für Ausbaugebiet
Wartegründe (z.B. durch Bulk Order)
Bemerkungen der NE3 und NE4 Techniker
acceptance_criteria: Additional information for FTTH orders is mapped to product orders
Additional information is available by events
Additional information is available by API calls
